text: Læa phraxngkh khux phu srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin nı raya 6 wan læa ballangk khxng phraxngkh xyu henux na pheux phraxngkh ca thrng thdsxb phwk than wa phu dı nı hmu phwk than mi kar ngan thi di yeiym læa hak cea (muhammad) klaw wa “thæcring phwk than ca thuk hı fun khunchiph khun ma hlangcak thi di tay pi læw” nænxn brrda phu ptiseth sraththa ca klaw wa “ni michı xun dı ley nxkcak leh kl xyang chad cæng”
